name: Smash (Jan Kanty Janiszewski)
description:
Project made over 3 days as part of MA in Visual Game and Media Design programme at The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts.

All animations were recorded using a Motion Capture  suit by Rokkoko which was the focus of the jam.

Game Design and Gameplay Programming - Jonas Halver

Character Controller and Mo-Cap Animations - Jan Kanty Janiszewski

Lead 3D Artist - Mia Marie Boas

3D Artists - Cille Rosenorn Abildhauge, Juan Hernandez

UI Design - Ana Ruth

2D Art and Animations - Johan August Christiansen
